channel.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Known
channel.description:
> # [color=gray]The Known[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Known Presence)** - Everyone will be notified of your presence. > **Passive (Protector)** - Anyone visiting you will be **Death Immune** & **Conversion Immune** for the night.(Locked if **[color=gray]The Known[/color]** has decided to join **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]**.) > **Passive (Enemy)** - Anyone visiting you will not be affected by **[color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color]**'s **Empower**.(Locked if **[color=gray]The Known[/color]** has decided to join **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]**.) > > **Day Ability (Announcement)** - Make an announcement , silencing **The Court** for 5 seconds.(1 Use - **The Path of Progression**) / **Day Ability (Silence)** - You can't be accused of treason today.(1 Use - **The Path of Destruction**) > **Day Ability (Choose Your Destiny)** - Decide your alignment.(Infinite Uses - **The Path of Progression** - [**[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]**] or **The Path of Destruction** - [**[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]**] ~ Must choose your alignment until D4) > > **Night Ability (Peaceful)** - Anyone visiting you will be cured of **Negative Effects**.(2 Uses) / **Night Ability (Friends)** - Anyone visiting you will be vulnerable to **Negative Effects**.(2 Uses) > **Night Ability (Revenge)** - If a member of one of the opposing factions visit you , you will kill them.(2 Uses - **The Path of Progression**) / **Night Ability (Request)** - If a member of your same faction visit you , you will learn their identity.(2 Uses - **The Path of Destruction**) > **Goal:** *Survive.*
> **Faction Goal:** *If **[color=gray]The Known[/color]** dies , your faction loses.*

item.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Known
item.dc:creator: TheSenate
item.description:
This seems like a fun class, and i would love to play it, however it feels like the game revolves around this class, taking importance away from Kings, Princes and CL/MM, since this class decides who wins the game.

Read full topic

item.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Known
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Known

Neutral Special

Passive (Known Presence) - Everyone will be notified of your presence.
Passive (Protector) - Anyone visiting you will be Death Immune & Conversion Immune for the night.(Locked if The Known has decided to join The Unseen/The Cult.)
Passive (Enemy) - Anyone visiting you will not be affected by The Court Wizard’s Empower.(Locked if The Known has decided to join The Blue Dragon.)

Day Ability (Announcement) - Make an announcement , silencing The Court for 5 seconds.(1 Use - The Path of Progression) / Day Ability (Silence) - You can’t be accused of treason today.(1 Use - The Path of Destruction)
Day Ability (Choose Your Destiny) - Decide your alignment.(Infinite Uses - The Path of Progression - [The Blue Dragon] or The Path of Destruction - [The Unseen/The Cult] ~ Must choose your alignment until D4)

Night Ability (Peaceful) - Anyone visiting you will be cured of Negative Effects.(2 Uses) / Night Ability (Friends) - Anyone visiting you will be vulnerable to Negative Effects.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Revenge) - If a member of one of the opposing factions visit you , you will kill them.(2 Uses - The Path of Progression) / Night Ability (Request) - If a member of your same faction visit you , you will learn their identity.(2 Uses - The Path of Destruction)
Goal: Survive.

Faction Goal: If The Known dies , your faction loses.

Read full topic
